modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will be applied to your healing bonus.
modifier.markdownDescription: If specified, this modifier will be applied to your healing bonus.

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to your healing bonus.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to your healing bonus.

type.description:
## Modify Healing

---



[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_healing)

Modifies the amount of health you get from all sources of healing *(e.g natural regen, instant health effect, regeneration effect)*

Type ID: `origins:modify_healing`



---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "origins:modify_healing",
    "modifier": {
        "operation": "multiply_total",
        "value": 1
    }
}
```

This example will double the effectiveness of all healing used on you.
```json
{
    "type": "origins:modify_healing",
    "modifier": {
        "operation": "multiply_total",
        "value": -0.5
    }
}
```

This example will half the effectiveness of all healing used on you.
